text: The Way We Were is a 1973 American romantic drama movie directed by Sydney Pollack. It stars Barbra Streisand and Robert Redford. Arthur Laurents wrote both the novel and screenplay. It is based on his college days at Cornell University and his experiences with the House Un-American Activities Committee.The Way We Were , Good Reads. ==References== Category:1973 romantic drama movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Sydney Pollack Category:Movies composed by Marvin Hamlisch Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books
